analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/23/0x59b941b53403f84f42d5c11117b35564881b72f6.sol#150-151) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/23/0x59b941b53403f84f42d5c11117b35564881b72f6.sol#155-157)
ECRecovery.recover (/unique_chucks/23/0x59b941b53403f84f42d5c11117b35564881b72f6.sol#69-106) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in TokenUnidirectional.claim (/unique_chucks/23/0x59b941b53403f84f42d5c11117b35564881b72f6.sol#432-455):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(token.transfer(channel.receiver,channel.value),Unable to transfer token to channel receiver) (/unique_chucks/23/0x59b941b53403f84f42d5c11117b35564881b72f6.sol#439-446)
	- require(bool,string)(token.transfer(channel.receiver,payment),Unable to transfer token to channel receiver) (/unique_chucks/23/0x59b941b53403f84f42d5c11117b35564881b72f6.sol#446-448)
	- require(bool,string)(token.transfer(channel.sender,change),Unable to transfer token to channel sender) (/unique_chucks/23/0x59b941b53403f84f42d5c11117b35564881b72f6.sol#449-453)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- channels (/unique_chucks/23/0x59b941b53403f84f42d5c11117b35564881b72f6.sol#453-454)
